column1: If you heat ice, it melts.
column2: 如果你加热冰，它就会融化。

column1: If plants don't get sunlight, they die.
column2: 如果植物没有阳光，它们就会死亡。

column1: If you mix red and blue, you get purple.
column2: 如果你混合红色和蓝色，你会得到紫色。

column1: If water boils, it turns into steam.
column2: 如果水沸腾，它就会变成蒸汽。

column1: If you drop a glass, it breaks.
column2: 如果你摔碎一个玻璃杯，它就会碎。

column1: If you are tired, you feel sleepy.
column2: 如果你累了，你就会感到困倦。

column1: If it rains, the ground gets wet.
column2: 如果下雨，地面就会变湿。

column1: If you don't eat, you get hungry.
column2: 如果你不吃饭，你就会饿。

column1: If you study hard, you learn more.
column2: 如果你努力学习，你会学到更多。

column1: If you touch a hot stove, you get burned.
column2: 如果你触摸热炉子，你会烫伤。

column1: If you cut your finger, it bleeds.
column2: 如果你割伤手指，它就会流血。

column1: If you don't sleep enough, you feel tired.
column2: 如果你睡眠不足，你就会感到疲倦。

column1: If the sun sets, it gets dark.
column2: 如果太阳落山，天就会变黑。

column1: If you are thirsty, you drink water.
column2: 如果你渴了，你就会喝水。

column1: If you are hungry, you eat food.
column2: 如果你饿了，你就会吃东西。

column1: If you freeze water, it becomes ice.
column2: 如果你冷冻水，它就会变成冰。

column1: If you mix yellow and blue, you get green.
column2: 如果你混合黄色和蓝色，你会得到绿色。

column1: If you don't water plants, they dry up.
column2: 如果你不给植物浇水，它们就会枯萎。

column1: If you are cold, you put on a coat.
column2: 如果你冷，你会穿上外套。

column1: If you feel sick, you see a doctor.
column2: 如果你感觉不舒服，你会去看医生。
